columns.description: StatsAPI game primary key identifying the contest.
columns.name: game_pk

columns.description: Game type code (regular season, postseason, spring, etc.).
columns.name: type

columns.description: Doubleheader flag (Y = same-day twin bill, N = single, S = split-ticket).
columns.name: double_header

columns.description: MLB string identifier (e.g., YYYYMMDD away@home code).
columns.name: id

columns.description: Legacy Gameday feed type used for configuration.
columns.name: gameday_type

columns.description: Indicates whether the game is a postseason tiebreaker.
columns.name: tiebreaker

columns.description: Game number used to distinguish doubleheaders (1 or 2).
columns.name: game_number

columns.description: Internal calendar-event identifier for scheduling systems.
columns.name: calendar_event_i_d

columns.description: Season year the game belongs to.
columns.name: season

columns.description: Season label formatted for display (e.g., "2024").
columns.name: season_display

columns.description: Scheduled first-pitch timestamp in local time.
columns.name: date_time

columns.description: Originally scheduled date prior to postponements.
columns.name: original_date

columns.description: Official MLB date of record (used for standings).
columns.name: official_date

columns.description: Day/night classification for the scheduled start.
columns.name: day_night

columns.description: Scheduled first-pitch clock time (local).
columns.name: time

columns.description: AM/PM indicator paired with the scheduled time.
columns.name: ampm

columns.description: Weather conditions string reported at first pitch.
columns.name: condition

columns.description: Game-time temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.
columns.name: temp

columns.description: Wind direction/speed string at first pitch.
columns.name: wind

columns.description: Official paid attendance for the game.
columns.name: attendance

columns.description: Timestamp of the actual first pitch.
columns.name: first_pitch

columns.description: Elapsed game duration in minutes.
columns.name: game_duration_minutes

columns.description: Verbose MLB game status (e.g., "Final/9", "Postponed").
columns.name: detailed_state

columns.description: Compact MLB status code (e.g., F, PPD).
columns.name: status_code

columns.description: MLBAM venue identifier hosting the game.
columns.name: venue_id

columns.description: Ballpark name.
columns.name: venue_name

columns.name: home_team_name

description: Flattened GUMBO/StatsAPI game feed summarizing scheduling context, weather, venue, line scores, and aggregate batting/pitching/fielding stats for both clubs in a single record.
name: Raw Game Summaries
